docs.name: MaterialChipsComponent
docs.comment: A chips collection widget, displaying a list of objects as Chips.

inputs.name: itemRenderer
inputs.comment:
A function to render items as a string.

Note: this ItemRenderer is only used when a SelectionModel is also provided. If chips are manually rendered, the itemRenderer property will also need to be manually set on them.

Note about OnPush: If ItemRenderer is not a pure function and has internal state that may render the same item differently, the reference itself must change in order to take effect.

docs.name: MaterialChipComponent
docs.comment:
A "chip" widget renders an object in the 'chip' format - a rounded box with a shadow, typically used in a horizontal list. Any object implementing the HasUIDisplayName interface can be used, or no object at all.

The delete button is only shown when a selectionModel is set on the widget or a removable property is true. When hasLeftIcon is true, the left-icon content should be set to a MaterialIconComponent or an SVG image. Chip components are rendered in a material-chips component.

inputs.name: hasLeftIcon
inputs.comment: Whether the chip should show the custom icon, default to false.

inputs.name: itemRenderer
inputs.comment:
An ItemRenderer function (takes an object and returns a string).

If ItemRenderer is not state-less, and may return different values for the same input item, then the ItemRenderer reference needs to update, or that change will not be reflected.

When provided, it is used to generate a label for the chip.

inputs.name: removable
inputs.comment: Whether the chip should show remove button, default to true.

inputs.name: selectionModel
inputs.comment:
A selection model to render as chips.

This model should not be used for rendering, changes will not be reflected.

Chips can be deselected from the model via user interaction unless removable is set to false.

inputs.name: value
inputs.comment:
Data model to render.

Provide your own label in the content of the chip, or provide an ItemRenderer.

outputs.name: remove
outputs.comment: Event fired when the chip is removed which returns the value of the chip.
